message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worthwhile. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping we could come to a better agreement. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me and the price you're willing to sell it for.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise a bit further, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000 again, but this time I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'm including a free warranty and dedicated support for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
